It's an amazing thrilling game.

highly recommend it!

TIPS FOR NEW PEOPLE: 
1. Only play as Dwight.
2. Never heal your team mates they will poison you and you will die.
3. Always try to find the killer he is friendly and likes to give out hugs.
4. Never use any of your bloodpoints their useless.
Very fun but didn't work for the first two hours and the game froze up other than that It was fun for the 3 days of free play.
This is a good game rather enjoyable even after a year of the release good dlcs and every thing bugs here and there but hey every game as those

Non male l'idea, horror al punto giusto, ma √® ancora pieno di bug, problemi ecc.. ve ne elenco alcuni: spesso durante la fuga con le staccionate, nonostante l'avessi passate venivo colpito uguale, spesso alcuni oggetti non li fa rompere... i server sempre incasinati, eppure nonostante il successo ancora non fanno nulla. Il gioco crasha anche durante la ricerca di una lobby, anche 2 o 3 volte a fila e la cosa diventa molto snervante. 
Alcuni personaggi sono troppi op... esempio Michal Myers utilizza una perks che colpisce con un solo colpo il nemico, e un altra abilit√† che pu√≤ vedere attreverso i muri nelle vicinanze (30m che sono tanti) i sopravvissuti in gioco. Altro personaggio squilibrato gli hanno dato una motosega, che pu√≤ utilizzare sempre, che ne triplica la velocit√† e con un colpo solo uccide il sopravvissuto.
I problemi relativi ai sopravvissuti √® che ai primi livelli sono veramente scarsi, quasi inutile giocare con un personaggio di livello 1 mentre ne hai un altro al livello 20... ci sono delle abilit√† troppo esagerate. Lo stun automatico (quando il sopravvissuto si libera) infatti, si pu√≤ attivare ogni volta, con ricarica di 30 sec... quindi diventa impossibile al killer se tutti e 4 l'hanno in squadra... 
Queste sono solo alcuni dei difetti che vi ho elencato, questo gioco nonostante i mesi non accenna a migliorare, anzi rilascia DLC dove aggiunge qualche mappa, a pagamento. senza per√≤ migliorare e bilanciare i difetti del gioco. Anche solo i server sarebbe gi√† qualcosa. 
Penso che chieder√≤ il rimborso.
FIX THE FUCKING MATCHMAKING MAN! ALWAYS GETTING LVL 10 or 8 or 4  AS A KILLER VS ME.. A LVL 20!!! FFS!!! FIX THE MATCHMAKING!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I'd recommend to buy this game if you have at least 1-2 friends to play with because its way more fun and easier to coordinate - But playing alone can be fun as well if youre lucky with random mates or just play as the killer, otherwise its more challenging (if you like that) and sometimes you meet nice/generous killers too.

If youre the grind type of guy you might spend much time in this game unlocking prestige 3 for every character which takes some time but is mainly for cosmetics (bloody skins) so dont worry if youre not a grinder, you can play the game casually (like me) and still have fun, rounds dont last very long like 10-20min depending on your teams performance

Graphics are nice as well and some things got updated recently like dedicated servers and better graphics like generators and crates
Updates are quite consistently, usually some new killer dlc which include a new map and survivor as well like every few months or some quality of life stuff

Additionally there is some 'season pass mission thing' where you can collect rewards for finishing missions

BELLA IDEA MA DISCUTIBILE REALIZZAZIONE
L'idea che sta alla base del titolo √® molto bella e di per s√® il gameplay √® valido, ma il tutto √® rovinato da uno sbilanciamento impressionante soprattutto di u certo mayers ed in alte cose che rende il gioco ho facilissimo o frustrante senza alcuna linea comune che segua l'abilit√† del giocatore e non il killer che si sceglie o dal quale si viene inseguiti.
Per non parlare dei bug e dell'ottimizzazione. Dare una valutazione positiva a questo gioco per me √® assolutamente fuori discussione, finch√® non si saranno risolti i problemi di bilanciamento e soprattutto di ottimizzazione che affligono questo titolo, non potr√≤ ritenermi del tutto soddisfatto di questo titolo.
The developers definetly deserve so much respect after this masterpiece
A fun game but too long loading screens and many crashes. They need to improve some things in the multiplayer screens.

Fun to murder all your friends and i would suggest investing in some of the DLC if you love playing a killer main. Otherwise, splash some money on cool survivor outfits, if you're gonna die, do it in style right?
FIX THE BROKEN LOBBIES PLEASE. It's killing the game :(

The only problem I have with this game is the buggy menus and the use of p2p connection. P2p is outdated and they should have tried to use dedicated servers instead. The host is alwasy the killer so if his connection is shit then he'll probably clean house. Other than that, this game is very fun but I would say buy it only when on sale.

Holy shit when you hit the surivve with friends button it fucking freezes for a solid 10 years then loads you in after you closed the application. Not to mention the mutliplayer and connectivity is absolute dogshit this game fails to function on every level do not spend 21,99 on early acess bootleg game made by some randy devlopers that try to milk this game down to the last drip with pay to win dlc and content that should be free

This game is amazing. 10/10. I would definitely reccomend buying this game because its scary and graet to play with friends. If you are into survival multiplayer games then this is your game.

OYUNA PUANIM 10/8

Re-doing my Review.
Game honestly was never good at launch and during the beta... It was the only option because Evolve was already dead.

During its launch it has done nothing but devolve and the Devs have always done things the playerbase as a whole disagrees with while belitting us.

As of late during the Pin-Head DLC they made him an NFT while not even reaching out to the OG Voice Actor to Pin-Head.
Iv not been able to in good faith recommend this game and i only kept playing it due to the lack of other games in its space.

Now with VHS getting its Beta they are actively showing they are scared of that game by having an BP Event during the time frame of that Beta when the Event never normally runs.
It says alot.

Beside what i said, Balance is a joke.. They only fix issues by selling you DLC with perks for addressing these issues causing more issues. 
Matchs can be lost or won purely due to map RNG.

This game is just ok selection of really good horror characters in a ok shell of a game with ok gameplay and a horridly HARSH grind.


--- Edit ---
After a year break i come back to see the grind really hasnt improved its just gotten insanely worse.
Hitbox's on everything are genuinely horrid still, New maps are just utterly ass and insanely unfun. 

Screw this game and i cant wait for it to die like the rat game it is.

Game of the year 2016 ~ Still some bugs and 85% Killer sided, but still really good!
